Calls {{lc|close()}} to close the associated file and destructs all other members of {{tt|basic_filebuf}}. If an exception occurs during the destruction of the object, including the call to {{lc|close()}}, it is caught and not rethrown.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Notes===
Typically called by the destructor of {{lc|std::basic_fstream}}.
